byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: loaded German bomber, shot down in Essex coast town, falls on homes; takes civilian toll; German planes active along Brit coast
snippet: LONDON, Wednesday, May 1-- The heaviest civilian toll and greatest damage to private property in the British Isles since the outbreak of the war is believed to have occurred when a German bombing plane was shot down in flames in a coast town in Es...

headline.main: Loaded Nazi Bomber Falls on English Homes; Heavy Explosion Takes Civilian Toll in Essex

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Wednesday, May 1-- The heaviest civilian toll and greatest damage to private property in the British Isles since the outbreak of the war is believed to have occurred when a German bombing plane was shot down in flames in a coast town in Essex late last night.
